overview: Y'all just don't know the trouble we get into here at Lot 45. Us Trailer Park Boys can be a rowdy bunch. We work hard, we play hard, and we get hard. And buddy, when one of them guys gets a hard-on, well it's got to go up some other guy's butt. Ain't nothing wrong with taking your buddy's dick when he needs a place to stick it.
title: Uncle Drew
